label: Agent
definition: The volitional causer of an action or event

label: Patient
examples: The storm damaged the building (building = Patient)

label: Recipient
definition: Receiver or beneficiary of an action
examples: John gave Mary a book (Mary = Recipient)
She sent him a message (him = Recipient)

label: Experiencer
definition: Entity experiencing a mental or emotional state

label: Instrument
definition: Tool or means by which an action is performed
examples: He cut the bread with a knife (knife = Instrument)
She opened the door with a key (key = Instrument)

label: Location
definition: Spatial location where an action or state occurs
examples: The meeting took place in the office (office = Location)

label: Source
definition: Origin point of movement or transfer
examples: He took the book from the shelf (shelf = Source)

label: Goal
definition: Destination or endpoint of movement or action
examples: He sent the package to his friend (friend = Goal)

label: Time
definition: Temporal specification of when an action occurs
